Class InputNodeRenderer

Namespace
FlowGraph.Avalonia.Rendering.NodeRenderers
Assembly
FlowGraph.Avalonia.dll

Renderer for input nodes with a distinctive green color scheme. Displays a ">" icon and supports inline label editing.

public class InputNodeRenderer : StyledNodeRendererBase, IEditableNodeRenderer, INodeRenderer

Properties

DefaultLabel

Gets the default label when no label or data is set.

protected override string DefaultLabel { get; }

Property Value

string

IconGeometry

Gets the geometry for a vector icon. This takes precedence over IconText. Use this to integrate with any icon library (Lucide, Material, FontAwesome, etc.) by providing the icon's path data. 

// Simple arrow icon
protected override Geometry? IconGeometry => 
    Geometry.Parse("M5 12h14M12 5l7 7-7 7");

// Or use a static geometry for better performance
private static readonly Geometry _icon = Geometry.Parse("M5 12h14");
protected override Geometry? IconGeometry => _icon;
protected override Geometry? IconGeometry { get; }

Property Value

Geometry
